sentence: When Florida Governor Ron DeSantis signed the Parental Rights in Education bill into law on March 28, Disney issued a statement saying it "should never have passed" and said that it should be repealed.
title: UPDATE 2-Disney's corporate affairs head, Morrell, to leave company

author: Mia Jankowicz
title: Gavin Newsom delivers scorching criticism of Democrats' response to protecting Roe v. Wade: 'Where the hell's my party?'
